title: Minutes to Freeways and Shopping
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 675 Sq.
Discover the stunning hills of Kirkland, Washington living at Sancerre Apartments.
Our community melds the old-world charm of the French countryside with contemporary comforts and convenience.
A variety of dining, retail, and entertainment options are minutes away.
Close to Interstate 405 makes commuting a breeze, and you’re only a short drive from the excitement of Seattle.
Experience a new standard of living at Sancerre Apartments.
*We do not accept Reusable Tenant Screening Reports

Panasonic Whisper Fan*, Cable and Internet Ready, Hardwood Flooring Throughout*, GE Stainless Steel Appliances, Fenced in Privacy Yards*, Mirrored Closet Doors, Designer Lighting, Extra Storage, Breakfast Bar, Faux Wood Blinds, Full-size Washer and Dryer in Home, Granite Countertops*, Wood Burning Fireplace*, Balcony or Patio, Wall to Wall Carpet Floors*, Custom Cabinetry*

Soothing Spa, Guest Parking, Business Center, On-call Maintenance, Easy Access to Public Transportation, Covered Parking, Short-term Leasing Available, Minutes to Freeways and Shopping, On-site Maintenance, State-of-the-Art Fitness Center, Pet Waste Stations, Leasing Center Treats, Cable and Internet Ready, Professionally Landscaped, Picnic Area with Barbecue, Disability Access*, Seasonal Outdoor Swimming Pool, Assigned Parking, Public Parks Nearby
Weight limit of 50 pounds or less.
Non-refundable pet fee is $300 per pet.
Monthly pet rent will be charged per pet.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
